mapper.insert: insert into XNHB_MONEY_WAITAUDITXNBT( CREATEDATETIME, UPDATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, KEYWORD, LOGINNAME, USERNICKNAME, USERREALNAME, XNBTYPE, STATUS, TRADINGTYPE, NUM, POUNDAGE, WITHDRAWALADDRESS, WAITAUDITXNBT_ID ) values ( #{CREATEDATETIME}, #{UPDATEDATETIME}, #{CREATEUSER}, #{UPDATEUSER}, #{KEYWORD}, #{LOGINNAME}, #{USERNICKNAME}, #{USERREALNAME}, #{XNBTYPE}, #{STATUS}, #{TRADINGTYPE}, #{NUM}, #{POUNDAGE}, #{WITHDRAWALADDRESS}, #{WAITAUDITXNBT_ID} )
mapper.update: update XNHB_MONEY_WAITAUDITXNBT set WAITAUDITXNBT_ID = WAITAUDITXNBT_ID where WAITAUDITXNBT_ID = #{WAITAUDITXNBT_ID}
mapper.select: select CREATEDATETIME, UPDATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, KEYWORD, LOGINNAME, USERNICKNAME, USERREALNAME, XNBTYPE, STATUS, TRADINGTYPE, NUM, POUNDAGE, WITHDRAWALADDRESS, WAITAUDITXNBT_ID from XNHB_MONEY_WAITAUDITXNBT where WAITAUDITXNBT_ID = #{WAITAUDITXNBT_ID}

select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.KEYWORD, a.LOGINNAME, a.USERNICKNAME, a.USERREALNAME, a.XNBTYPE, a.STATUS, a.TRADINGTYPE, a.NUM, a.POUNDAGE, a.WITHDRAWALADDRESS, a.WAITAUDITXNBT_ID from XNHB_MONEY_WAITAUDITXNBT a

select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.KEYWORD, a.LOGINNAME, a.USERNICKNAME, a.USERREALNAME, a.XNBTYPE, a.STATUS, a.TRADINGTYPE, a.NUM, a.POUNDAGE, a.WITHDRAWALADDRESS, a.WAITAUDITXNBT_ID from XNHB_MONEY_WAITAUDITXNBT a
mapper.delete:
delete from XNHB_MONEY_WAITAUDITXNBT where WAITAUDITXNBT_ID in
#{item}
